channel.title: Cant log out till out of combat
channel.description:
Has any1 got the code so when you are in combat you cant log out till you are out of combat and have to wait 10 seconds?
I can't figure out how to do it.
Can someone help me out please?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 19, 2007, 12:50:02 PM[/size][hr]Bump Soz.

item.title: Cant log out till out of combat
item.dc:creator: @SSG_Fan_XX SSG Fan XX
item.description:
@SSG_Fan_XX wrote:

search

case 8237

Right under the last Break;
put in under it

case 9154: //Log out if (LogoutDelay >= 1) { sendMessage("You have to wait 10 seconds out of being in combat to logout."); } else { logout(); savemoreinfo(); saveStats(); }

Read full topic
item.source: Cant log out till out of combat
